title: Catalog and stabilize the datalake
lesson: Pin pyarrow/pandas/s3fs versions for deterministic Parquet IO.
Normalize partitioned fields (e.g., symbol) to plain string columns across all shards.
Back up originals before mutation under a dedicated backups/ folder per asset.
Publish machine-readable catalog (schema+manifest) next to human README and keep a global assets_index.json.
Keep ingesters secretless: load API keys from SSM at runtime; never commit or echo them.
Verify after each write: row counts, date ranges, and sample reads; store QA reports under system/qa and link from the catalog.
